REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F E f8193 reute d f BC-TRUS-JOIST-<TJCO>-TO 03-18 0049

TEXT.TITLE: TRUS JOIST <TJCO> TO ACQUIRE CANADIAN FIRM
TEXT.BODY: Trus Joist Corp said it agreed to purchase Dashwood Industries Ltd, a Canadian wood window and patio door manufacturer, for an undisclosed amount of cash. Trus Joist said it expects to close the transaction before June 30. Reuter
